# 选择与开始

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xuanze-yu-kaishi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xuanze-yu-kaishi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xuanze-yu-kaishi
xuanze-yu-kaishi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xuanze-yu-kaishi
xuanze-yu-kaishi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
